solution_line_template: Clyde's tower is 1/8 the size of Grace's tower or {grace_tower_height} inches / {clyde_tower_ratio_denominator} = <<{grace_tower_height}/{clyde_tower_ratio_denominator}={clyde_tower_height}>>{clyde_tower_height} inches tall.
Grace's tower is {grace_tower_height} inches - {clyde_tower_height} inches = <<{grace_tower_height}-{clyde_tower_height}={height_difference}>>{height_difference} inches taller than Clyde's.
